title: AzureCafContextOptions
description: Schema for the CAF context configuration file.

$schema.description: A reference to the schema definition for this context file.

tenantId.description: The GUID of the tenant in Azure which is holding management resources.

subscriptionId.description: The GUID of a subscription which should be targeted in the current context.

rootManagementGroupId.description: The ID of the root management group.

managementGroupId.description: The ID of a management group which should be targeted in the current context.

managementSubscriptionId.description: The GUID of the subscription which is holding management resources.

adminEntraGroupName.description: The name of the Entra security group which represents elevated users in PIM.

companyShort.description: Short name or abbreviation of the company.

isRoot.description: Defines if this is the root .azcontext so the searcher will not search up the tree.

forceContext.description: Defines if the context will be set in any case to the tenant and subscription provided here.

forceAzConfig.description: Defines if the Powershell AZ config should be refreshed every time.

subscriptionsToIgnore.description: An optional array of subscription ids which should be ignored by CAF scripts.

cspServicePrincipalId.description: Optional id of the CSP service principle.

managementGroupsToIgnore.description: List of management group IDs to ignore.

offerName.description: The name of the Lighthouse Offer to display.

offerDescription.description: A descriptive text for the offer.

managedByTenantId.description: The unique id of the tenant of the Lighthouse partner.

authorizations.description: The authorizations required by the managing tenants principals.

items.description: A single element which maps a certain SP from the managing tenant to a role in the target tenant.

roleDefinitionId.description: The unique id of the role.

defaultOrganizationName.description: Default organization name for Azure DevOps projects.

projects.description: Object containing project configurations with project names as keys.

^.*$.description: Array of service connection configurations for a project.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription ID in Azure related to this service connection.

managementGroupId.description: Management group ID where this subscription resides.

serviceConnectionScope.description: Scope of the service connection (e.g., 'subscription' or 'managementGroup').

organizationName.description: Name of the Azure DevOps organization for this connection, overrides defaultOrganizationName.

projectName.description: Optional name/key for the project entry.

azureBudgets.description: Configuration for Azure budget settings. Supports automatic date calculation and flexible global/subscription-level overrides.

defaultActionGroupResourceId.description: Resource ID for the default action group to notify when budget thresholds are exceeded. Used as fallback when subscription-level actionGroupResourceId is not specified.

startDate.description: Optional global start date for budgets in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not specified, defaults to first day of current month. Can be overridden at subscription level.

endDate.description: Optional global end date for budgets in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not specified, defaults to first day of current month plus one year. Can be overridden at subscription level.

currency.description: Optional global currency code for budgets (e.g., 'USD', 'EUR', 'GBP'). Can be overridden at subscription level.

thresholdRules.description: Optional global array of threshold percentages for budget alerts (e.g., [80, 90, 100]). Can be overridden at subscription level.

thresholdType.description: Optional global type of threshold calculation. 'Actual' uses current spending, 'Forecasted' uses predicted spending. Can be overridden at subscription level.

subscriptions.description: Budget configurations for various subscriptions. Each subscription can override global settings.

^.*$.description: Array of budget configurations for the subscription. Multiple budgets can be defined with different time grains.

items.description: Individual budget configuration. Required fields: timeGrain, amount. Optional fields override global settings.

timeGrain.description: Time grain for the budget period.

amount.description: Budget amount in the specified currency.

startDate.description: Optional start date override for this budget in YYYY-MM-DD format. Overrides global startDate and auto-calculation.

endDate.description: Optional end date override for this budget in YYYY-MM-DD format. Overrides global endDate and auto-calculation.

currency.description: Optional currency override for this budget. Overrides global currency setting.

thresholdRules.description: Optional threshold percentages override for this budget. Overrides global thresholdRules.

thresholdType.description: Optional threshold calculation type override for this budget. Overrides global thresholdType.

actionGroupResourceId.description: Optional action group resource ID override for this budget. Overrides defaultActionGroupResourceId.
